com.github.lucbui.pipeline

Interface PointerFieldFriendlyDoublePipe

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DoublePipe<FieldObject>, PointerFieldFriendlyReadPipe, PointerFieldFriendlyWritePipe, ReadPipe<FieldObject>, WritePipe<FieldObject>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OffsetFieldPipe, PaletteFieldPipe, SpriteFieldPipe

    public interface PointerFieldFriendlyDoublePipe
extends DoublePipe<FieldObject>, PointerFieldFriendlyReadPipe, PointerFieldFriendlyWritePipe
    A DoublePipe that correctly handles PointerFields When reading, if the incoming field has the @PointerField annotation, a Pointer is read at the iterator, rather than the normal object. The actual object is then read from that Pointer. If @PointerField is not encountered, the object is read as normal. When writing, If the incoming field has the @PointerField annotation, the repoint strategy associated with the PointerObject is run. The associated pointer is written, the FieldObject's referent is changed to be the PointerObject's object, and the FieldObject's pointer is changed to the new pointer.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.lucbui.pipeline.PointerFieldFriendlyReadPipe

        makeObject, read

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.lucbui.pipeline.PointerFieldFriendlyWritePipe

        write, writeObject
